storyInfo: To help the girl find her pet, Ah Gen arrives at an animal shelter for clues, but first, he must help the owner with a small favor.

attributes.content: L.G.D. Headquarters, Upper Factor St., Uptown Lungmen
Noon

The L.G.D. is a special place. Those who have no business here tend to stay away, while those whom the L.G.D. itself has business with wish they could. That said, there will always be those looking for trouble, with or without business.
(Stands guard)
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Hey, Ah Sir, have you heard of the Haam Coeng Inn mafia warfare from twelve years ago?
(Ignores him)
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Ah Sir, what about the Po Wah Street Robbery on one rainy night ten years ago?
(Remains silent)
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Ah Sir, what about the dual murder seven years ago?
Mister, I know nothing about any of those events you just mentioned, and I've never heard anyone else talk about them either. Please stop disturbing me while I'm on duty.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: (Facepalms and sighs)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Ah, never mind.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Officer, I want to report a crime!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I just saw that man in front of you steal someone's bicycle at the plaza!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What? Why would I do that?!
That's slander, you prick!
Now, now, sir, there's nothing to worry about.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: We'll know whether you did it or not just by checking the security footage. Now, please step inside. And you, buddy boy? I'll need you to come in for a written statement, too.
attributes.name: L.G.D. Officer

attributes.content: Uh... Okay.
(Blinks) Alright, Officer.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Everything's going according to plan, Rockrock.)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Understood. Rock-27, activating stealth mode.)
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: The day before...
If I'm not mistaken, this should be the place.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Hello, is this the animal rescue shelter?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Hello?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Scram, I'm busy here!
I'm just here to ask something, not to start trouble.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You think I don't know how you little brats think?
You get yourselves all excited to adopt a pet, then the moment you get bored with it the next day, you abandon it out on the street.
Sir, I'm afraid you're mistaken. I'm here not to adopt. I'm just here to ask about a missing storm cloudbeast.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: And I told you to scram!
So you don't keep a close eye on your pet, and now that you've screwed up, you come crying to me.
Scram! I'm not here to wipe you irresponsible punks' asses.
You need your ass wiped, wipe it yourself!
Get out!
Can't you at least let me explain?!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Get out of my sight!
Hey! Open up! Just listen to me!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What the heck's with his temper?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Stop knocking, kid. He won't open that door.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: That's just how he is. Grumpy.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: Hello, Miss. Um... Do you know him?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I live next door. I can count on one hand the number of times I've talked to him this year, though. He's got a bad temper, and a pretty sketchy past, too. He used to be in the Siracusan mafia. You'd be out of your mind to get involved with him.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: Doesn't he run an animal rescue shelter? He can't be that bad.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I know you're a kid, but you shouldn't just believe everything people tell you. When he keeps his front door closed all day long, who's to say what he's really up to inside?
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: You can't trust anyone outside your family, much less someone who just slammed a door in your face.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: So did you see anything to make you so suspicious of him, Miss?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: The L.G.D. paid him a visit a couple of days ago.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: The L.G... D.?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You're not from around here, are you? The cops, basically. They said he was illegally keeping police beckbeasts.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: Police animals...? Isn't that... illegal?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: That's what I said. And if he's not afraid of keeping L.G.D. beckbeasts in his house, is he afraid of anything?
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: Then why does he keep all these rescues...?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Sure, I see him bring back animals sometimes, but he just as often takes them somewhere else. Maybe... he's been selling them to black market butchers or something.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: (That does sound sketchy... If he's actually doing shady business with an animal shelter as a front, I can't let it slide.)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Okay, I get it now. Thanks, Miss.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Well, I'm heading back inside then. And you should go on home. Don't hang around too much.
attributes.name: Neighbor

attributes.content: After the woman closes her door, Ah Gen doesn't leave but instead walks up to the shelter door and touches the doorknob with his finger. A small icicle enters the keyhole, and after a little back and forth movement, it lets out a light click.
He pushes the door open just a crack and quietly slips in through the narrow gap.
No cages, no fences. Only a small feeding bowl with days old water and food.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What about the rescues? Where did they go?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Did he really send them all to the butchers like his neighbor said?)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: But if that's the case, why would there be all this pet food...?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What's this on the table...? An architectural diagram?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Lungmen... Guard... Department... Headquarters... Hm? There are a few spots marked in red.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Detention cell, beckbeast kennels... Only a door separates the two, very close to each other...
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (What is this guy plotting? Is he doing all this just for that beckbeast?)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Hey, punk, who the hell are you? How'd you get in here?!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: What the hell? I swear I locked the door.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: How did it break? Urgh... And why is it so cold?!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Turns to stare at Ah Gen)
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: My bad, sir.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Was it you?! You better pay for this! I just got it replaced last week!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What do you mean, 'Huh?'
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Frowns) Uh... Sorry?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Right, mind if I ask what you're planning with this blueprint?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Picks up the diagram on the table)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Hey, punk, stop touching my stuff! I'm going to kill—!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Careful.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Mm... that's—
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Don't move, sir, or this ring of ice around your neck is only going to get tighter.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Not bad, kid.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: So, would you mind telling me what you're planning to do at the L.G.D. Headquarters?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Those shameless bastards... They made up some kind of excuse to take my beckbeast away! What, you don't think I should be trying to get him back?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Oh, but I heard it was you who took the cops' animal in the first place.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Pfft, the poor thing had one paw in the grave when I found it! Where were the L.G.D. then?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: We've been getting along just fine for years. What gives them the right to come take him away NOW?!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: So, you're saying you rescued it and kept it around...? But what about the other rescues? How come I don't see any sign of them here?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Take a look around. Does this place look like a safe place to keep animals? I bought a patch of land that used to be an abandoned factory. They're over there.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You think I buy that?
attributes.name: Ah Gen
Shelter Owner
attributes.content: Like I care whether you buy it...

attributes.name: Shelter Owner
attributes.content: Ugh.
What?!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: A microwave oven?!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What are you looking at?! I was just heating up a mantou!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: That's your dinner?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You sure ask a whole lot of questions, kid.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: That's all you're having for dinner?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What's that got anything to do with you?!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You have all this pet food around, but all you're having for dinner is a single mantou?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I've got so many mouths to feed, I gotta cut costs somewhere!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Pardon me.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Lowers his casting hand)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: *cough*—
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Nervously strokes his neck)
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Kid... You know Originium Arts, don't you?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Haha, let's just say I do.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Those lockpicking Arts of yours... Can you use them elsewhere?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You were asking about a storm cloudbeast, weren't you?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Yeah, he's been missing for a year now. Have you seen him, sir?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: To tell the truth, I've saved a few of them, but my memory isn't all that great. I don't remember the details, but I do keep files on all of them.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: So if you're willing to lend me a hand, I'll take a look for you.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Uh, all you have to do is flip through some files, but you want me to break into the L.G.D. with you. In what universe is that a fair deal?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Hmph, suit yourself. I'm not forcing you.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: But I guess you'll just have to ask somewhere else about your cloudbeast.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Lungmen Branch Office
Early morning
Ah Gen!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Huh? Morning, Rockrock.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You look terrible. Did I spook you?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Haha, I've been mulling over some stuff. Didn't even notice you.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Where were you this morning? Xiaobai came back pretty early last night and said you went to the slums by yourself. How was it? Find anything?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock...
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What's up?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I think I might've dug myself a huge hole I can't climb out of.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: So... did you say yes?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I guess? As far as we can tell there's no way we can get the beckbeast out, but I can at least help him get in.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Then why is he going?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: He said he's worried sick and has to see for himself, and that if his beckbeast isn't happy in there, he'll break it out of the building or die trying.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Is he crazy?! If he wants to take that risk, he can do it himself. Why do you have to go with him?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: I don't have a choice if we're going to find that cloudbeast. I've asked everyone else. He's the only one that pays any attention to the strays around here.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: And he wants to involve a kid? No, I won't let you. Who knows what that guy'll do?
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Rockrock, you guys have enough on your plate already. I can handle this much myself.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: And if push comes to shove, I'll just throw him under the bus. I'm pretty sure the L.G.D. will trust me more than a former mafioso.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: And what part of that is supposed to ease my nerves? Just give me a chance to help. I can make time to come with you.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: But I heard from the operators here that you guys work closely with the L.G.D. I'm a complete outsider though. Even if something goes wrong, you've got plausible deniability, so don't bother helping me.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You think that's what I'm worried about?!
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Calm down, okay?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Well... You're right. I can't be so reckless.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Right, so please just calm down and—
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: But I CAN send one of my drones.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: ...Wouldn't that give your identity away anyway?!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Closure gave me an all new optic refraction module that can make them temporarily invisible to the human eye.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: You sound pretty excited...
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I can even adjust the propellers' rotation and reduce its noise to a minimum. When it's in super silent mode, nobody will notice it in even the quietest room.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Um, so you keep all those tools on you...? Wait, are you really going to tear it apart here and now?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Shh, sit down. Don't go anywhere.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Just you wait, I'll be finished in no time, and this drone will definitely come in handy. The moment you set foot in that building, it'll find out where everyone is and which way you should go.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: It can even disrupt surveillance cameras and hide your tracks. Besides, if that guy really bothers you so much, I don't want to give him the upper hand.
attributes.name: Rockrock

attributes.content: Well... Thanks?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: L.G.D. Headquarters, Upper Factor St., Uptown Lungmen
Morning
Uh, I thought you said you were going to get us some water? Why did you get a pack of chips too?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Eat up.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: It's for me?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Who else? I don't eat this crap.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: ...Thanks.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Now eat. We'll start as soon as you're done.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You told me you knew how to get past the front door. Mind telling me what your plan is now?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What, you can't figure it out on your own?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You really were part of the mafia, huh?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Don't look the part?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: No, you look exactly the part... So why did you leave and start an animal rescue?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I was on the wrong side of a power struggle within the family. The boss kicked me out, and when I was down on my luck, I met Yangni. I saved him, and he saved me.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: That was when I figured out that there are things out there that needed me.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You two were close?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Of course. He was trembling when I first took him in, but these days, he's more scared without me around.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: What a story. A mafioso becoming best buddies with a police beckbeast.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: FORMER mafioso!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Hmph, when I first came to Lungmen, never thought I'd be sitting on the L.G.D.'s front doorstep with a kid while he scarfs down potato chips either.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Want any? I can't finish all this.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Give me one.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Time can leave the nastiest scars...
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: I must've lost it. Why am I even talking to a punk like you about all this? Not like you'd understand.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: That's all the chips. Okay, sir, let's go.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: L.G.D. Detention Cell, Upper Factor St., Uptown Lungmen
Afternoon
You serious? Jacking a bicycle?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: What's wrong with that? At the very least, we made it into the building.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I thought you were writing a statement. How'd you get here?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: I pulled a trick while I was writing it, and snuck out when the officer went to check things out.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Did you follow the route I drew to avoid all the cameras?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Don't worry, I have a much safer way. You could even say I was completely invisible to the cameras on my way here.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Oh right, remember what I told you? Don't put your hand on the doorknob. You could get frostbite.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Yeah, I got it. Now hurry up!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: The beckbeast kennels aren't too far from here. If we're quick, we can get back to the detention cell before they're back.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: We're only going for a quick look, right?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Shut up, I know that. Now hurry.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: I see it. It's right over there.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Yangni!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Runs in circle excitedly) Wrr. Wrrwwrr.
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: Yangni, let me look at you. Did you miss me when I was gone? I've been thinking about you every day.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Wrwwrrwr—
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: Okay, okay. I'm happy to see you doing so well here. Look at this room. It's bigger than my bedroom! Hahaha.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Wrwwrr?
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: I was thinking I'd bring you home no matter what, but look at you. They're taking such good care of you that you've gotten fat.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Sorry you had to suffer with me for so long.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Squeezes nose into a gap in the fencing to try to get out)
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: Heh, you're so fat now, you can't even squeeze through the fence.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Wrwwrrwrwwrr...
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: I know you miss me, but there's nothing we can do.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Ah Gen, it's time to go. The drone's detected a cop heading this way from the other side.
Who's talking?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: ...An invisible drone.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Why'd you bring something like that?!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: I'll explain later, but we've got to go, now. Someone's coming.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Give me a little more time. Let me talk to him just a little more!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Shut up and get going! I don't care if you're caught or not, but if you think I'll let you take Ah Gen down with you, you've got another think coming!
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: What's wrong with you, trying to give me a scare?!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Get going if you don't want to be caught! Do you really wanna get thrown in jail?
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: If anyone finds us, it's gonna be 'cause of how loud you are!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Yangni, I need to go now. We... We probably won't see each other again. You be good here. Eat well. Don't think about me anymore.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Wrrrr! Aoww!
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: (Keeps slamming the fence with its nose)
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: *Whine*...
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: (Wipes tears) Yangni, stop it!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Rockrock...
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: Why don't you send your drone away first? I'll stay here and buy him some time.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What are you planning? What if you get caught?
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: Don't worry. I won't bring you guys any trouble.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Rips shirt)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: What are you doing?
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: Masking up.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You sure you need to with me around?
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: (Opens mouth)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Stop being so courteous with me, or I'm leaving right now.
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: (Closes mouth)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Hey, we'll buy you ten minutes. If you have anything to say to your beckbeast, you better get on with it!
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: Why are you two going so far to help me?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Because I know that there are some things you'll never get a chance say again if you don't get it off your chest now.
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: Yeah.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: It's gotten colder here...
The wall's freezing up...? Shit, it's Originium Arts!
Requesting backup—
Before he is able to reach the comms button on his helmet, a rigid chunk of ice locks the L.G.D. officer's arms in place.

Seeing that he can't break free, he grits his teeth and tries to dash toward the wall, but before his feet even leave the ground, he feels a chill climb his legs. He looks down to find ice reaching all the way up to his waist.
Sorry, Officer, I'm not trying to hurt you. I just want to borrow something.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: First, I want to borrow this place. Next, I also want to borrow a few minutes.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You aren't even showing your face. Shouldn't you be showing your sincerity when asking a favor?
Haha, sorry about that.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: And when you're borrowing something, you might want to explain what you need it for.
Would you believe me if I told you someone's catching up with an old friend?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: If they have any catching up to do, take it to a cafe. Why do it in a beckbeast enclosure?
*exhales*...
You bastards, you're here to see Meituan, aren't you?! You sure got balls. Show yourself!
Crap... Shouldn't have said that!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (I didn't expect this guy to be such a quick thinker... What do we do, Ah Gen?)
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: (It's okay. That ice isn't going to melt any time soon. And once we're gone, there'll be no evidence left.)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Hurry, then. There'll be more of them here in just a moment.)
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: Get out here! Stop sneaking around!
So Meituan's been staying with a spineless man like you all those years, huh?!
You asshole—
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Crap, this guy really can't take an insult.)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Let him go, kid. I'm not leaving today without beating the shit out of this guy.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: And you got a kid to do your dirty work for you?!
Um... Officer, you have the wrong idea.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Ah Gen, I think we should probably stay quiet in front of him.)
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: Let him go, punk!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Let him go!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Uh... this is bad...)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Sorry about this, Officer.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Asshole!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: This is the L.G.D. HQ. You must really have brass ones to sneak in here to see Meituan.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: He's not Meituan! He's Yangni, and he's my pet!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You're wrong. His name is Meituan, and he's a beckbeast with first class honors. During the Chernobog Incident, he conducted countless search and rescue, bomb defusal, and tracking missions. There's no way you're his owner!
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: The hell are you on about? If not me, then who? You? Does he look like he thinks of you as his owner?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Alright, I'll tell you! Meituan's owner is the L.G.D. Senior Superintendent Tse Ming! I won't let ex-con scum like you fool around with his former partner!
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Like I give a musbeast's ass about his 'former' partner!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Stop resisting!
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Take your goddamn hands off me!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You let go of my leg first.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Why don't you take your arm off my neck first?!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Do you think they're fighting?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: No, more like bickering.
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: They aren't going to hurt themselves, are they? Rolling on the ground like that?
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: No, the only thing that's hurting here is the definition of the word 'fight.'
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: *Thump*—*Thump*—

Ah Gen turns around to find the beckbeast naively slamming into the fence. It seems to be very agitated by the sight of the two men tussling with each other and is trying to break itself free from the cage.
It slams into the cage harder and harder each time, bloodying its soft nose.
...And maybe this impatient little beckbeast.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: I think our first order of business is to stop it, rather than our tussling hooligans.
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: Hey, little fella, do you want out?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Rubs Ah Gen's hand)
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: You want the two of them to stop fighting, right?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Don't worry. Neither of them are any good at it. They won't hurt each other.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Though we really can't let them keep this up...
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Kneels and puts hand on the door handle)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: You've decided who to go with long ago, right?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Wrwwrr!
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: It's just that they never asked you.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Well, now's the time to tell them.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Go.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: (Wags tail)
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: Before the cage's door is even fully open, Yangni has squeezed itself out and started yelping at the tussling shelter owner and trainer.
Seeing that the two aren't paying it any attention, Yangni desperately bites the trainer's ankle. The pain immediately stops him, and he turns to look at the barking beckbeast.
Meituan, what's this about...?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Yangni...
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Can you two stop already?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Ah, you're finally showing yourself, boy.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: You're still a kid. Don't believe whatever lies he's feeding you. Go home. This isn't your fault. This is between us, so you stay out of it.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: That's right, scram already. Go look up those files you want at the abandoned factory at No. 4, 9th Street, Downtown. I knew this was gonna happen, I had one of my lackeys show you the way.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You know, I can totally separate you two by force if it comes down to it.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Hey, what are you doing, kid?!
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Yeah, what's with those icicles?!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: ...We let go on the count of three.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Phew—
attributes.name: Shelter Owner & Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: *Cough*... How come everyone's trying to strangle me these days?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Haha... What a coincidence.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Heh... I thought you were mafia. How the hell'd you survive till now with moves like that?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: You're in the L.G.D., and you've got the nerve to say that to me?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: I used to work a desk job.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: We... have desk jobs in the mafia too.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Rolls eyes)
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Mind standing a little further apart? Give me some room.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Do you have to squeeze between us?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Scoots over reluctantly) *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Wrwwrr!
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: Hehe, you want to sit next to me too.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You really want to follow him, Meituan?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: What's so good about that guy? He kept you in that dingy place and fed you cheap pet food.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: ...I can't offer him nearly as much as you guys can, but I... I've been feeding him and keeping him warm the best I can.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: All these years, if I was only 70% full, Yangni got to be 80%. If I was only 70% warm, he got to be 80%.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: I can't offer him the best of the best, just better than myself.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: When Ah Ming was still around, he'd start taking care of Meituan before sunrise. He spared no expense and gave him the finest the markets had to offer.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Do you remember him, Meituan?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Aoww...
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: He loved you, and always did absolutely everything he could for you, ever since you were still a pup.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: When Chernobog came crashing, he took you on that mission... And you went missing, and he gave his life. We couldn't even recover his full remains.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: You haven't forgotten him just because he's gone, have you?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Was this in Waang Saan Plaza?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: That's right...
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: I'll always remember that place.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: He remembers, too. Every now and then, he drags me to the place I found him, only to howl.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Is that so? If he remembers him so well, then how is he able to keep facing forward?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: *Whine*...
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: (Strokes the nose wound of the beckbeast in his arms)
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Kid, why are you being all quiet...?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: I'm just tired.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: ...You're really not a cute one, are you?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: So you're Yangni now, Meituan?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Aoww...
attributes.name: Yangni

attributes.content: You like him, don't you? Go with him, then. I won't keep you.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: What's this about?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: I'm tired. Some burdens are too heavy to carry for so many years.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: You're just going to give up?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Listen. If he's made up his mind to go with you, then I'm behind him all the way.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: I'll keep visiting that stinking hole in the wall of yours. And if I ever find you neglecting him, I'll show you what for.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: What a load of shit. Me? Neglect him?!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Shut up. I need to make a call.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: (Stop him!)
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Shh—
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Fu-zai, head to the third floor and get me some documents, will you?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Ah Tung, the air conditioning in the beckbeast kennels seems to be acting up. Could you send in a request to get it repaired for me?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: (Ah Gen, my surveillance shows that everyone who was heading this way is turning around.)
attributes.name: Rock-27

attributes.content: Let's get out of here, then.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Yangni, let's go. We're going home!
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Hey, why are you going back inside the cage?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Meituan...? Are you...
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Are you staying?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Look at you, you chowhound. Never gonna change, huh?
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Yangni lifts its round, circular rear off the ground and shakes it a little. Then, it picks up a bag of pet food with its mouth and leaves the cage, shaking its rear as it trots to the shelter owner.
L.G.D. Headquarters Front Door
This is as far as I can take you.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Good man... There are way too many turns inside this building, though. My head's still spinning.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: I only took you down that route to dodge my coworkers. Be grateful.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Haha, thanks, Ah Sir.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Hmph, I didn't do it for you.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: See you, Meituan... No, Yangni.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Be sure to come see him when you have time.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Lets out a long sigh)
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: Ah Ming, don't worry... I'll go check on him often.
attributes.name: Beckbeast Trainer

attributes.content: 4 9th Street, Downtown
Come in. I've got files on every animal I took care of.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: That's a lot... It's piled up to the ceiling.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: A storm cloudbeast... Let's see. I specifically remember sorting these into categories.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Rummages through files)
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Watch out, sir!
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: There we go. Fetch.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You got it.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: It's all in here. Let's see... Records from last year.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: I had a total of four storm cloudbeasts here over that time...
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Is it this one? An old woman nearby adopted it not long after I found it. It's not far from here.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: No, that one's got a damaged ear. The one I'm looking for doesn't.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: This one, then? No, its owner came to get him back...
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: The age isn't right either. That one's muzzle is turning gray.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Eh, it's got be this one then. It's got to be. Look. Exactly the same.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: You mean other than the big brown spot on its chest?
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Eh, sorry. My eyes aren't what they used to be.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Eh, what was that? Where did it go? I can't see anything under the table.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Just keep reading. I'll climb down to take a look.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Alright. Storm cloudbeast. Completely black coat. Unhurt. Escaped through the window on the morning of July 28. In the end...
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Keep reading. I think I found it. It's a collar with a nameplate.
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: ...All that was found was a snapped collar... and a large amount of blood on the ground. Judging from the amount of blood, it was... unlikely to have... survived.
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: (Holds the collar up to examine under the light)
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Is anything written on the nameplate?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: It says...
attributes.name: Ah Gen

attributes.content: Says what?
attributes.name: Shelter Owner

attributes.content: Sixty-Seven...
attributes.name: Ah Gen
